textAfterTable: [SoundScan Japan's methods of surveying home video sales are different from those of the competing firm Oricon, which often lead to differing results between the two. Neither firm directly posts more data for weekly sales than what is listed here. Any purportedly additional data comes from unverified, anonymous sources.] Source: Phile-web This article has a follow-up: Japan's Animation Blu-ray Disc Ranking, April 5-11 (2010-04-22 10:00) follow-up of Japan's Animation Blu-ray Disc Ranking, March 22-28 bookmark/share with: News homepage / archives Visit AniplexUSA.com RightStuf - Anime, Manga and More Around The Web
